name: Kershaw Reverb Folding Knife
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: From your keys, to your pack, to your belt loop, the Reverb folding knife is small enough to clip out of the way, but big enough to be useful.8Cr13MoV blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well.Stainless steel frame-lock design offers improved rigidity.Light and strong G10 and carbon fiber front handle scale.Machined fuller on the blade reduces weight and doubles as a nail nick for opening.Clean, snag-free design works well around outdoor gear.Deep-carry pocket clip is designed for right handed tip-up carry.Integrated carabiner clip.
